website_summaries.verdict: Can increase motor skills, teething and is visually appealing.
pros: Fits onto fingers from ages as young as 3 months
BPA-free and encourages babies to navigate the toy safely
Most babies are inclined to put this toy in their mouths, but must work through the atom-shaped features
Will maintain a baby's interest for months
cons: Clean according to directions – won't hold up to high temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Toy broke right away... choking hazard!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this toy but the first time my son held it it broke. Thank goodness my older daughter was there and saw it before he could get it into his mouth. It would’ve been such a choking hazard!! Returning it immediately and hoping this doesn’t happen to anyone else. It could have turned out so much worse...
customer_reviews.author: Heather Huisman

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Steam Sterilize
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's my "mom brain", but in my defense there were no care instructions given. I was so excited for this. I'm absolutely sure my daughter would've loved it, but it never made it that far. It melted. Straight up melted. Again, I didn't have any care instructions and assumed it would've made it. I was very wrong. RIP.
customer_reviews.author: MViggi

customer_reviews.title: So Fun for Little Fingers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3.5 month old (she’s 5 Months now). She loved it from Day 1 and still loves it now. When it first arrived I was a little worried about the little spokes because everything goes in the mouth. Sure enough...first thing it went in the mouth. After watching her closely, the spokes weren’t long enough to make her gag, so it’s fine to go in. The toy is well made and I’m very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Supergirl_C

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and easy to grab
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 4 month old to grab. She likes the colors. She likes to chew on it. I like that it's small and firs in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love, is a lighter plastic
customer_reviews.text: Love, is a lighter plastic.. just cleaned it with warm water. Read other reviews that mentioned not to dishwash it or use hot water because the toy melts. Overall my child likes the toy, wish the price was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 month old!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect toy for my 3 month old! It is small enough for her to hold onto and she loves the light rattle sound and the bright colors. Since I bought it 2 weeks ago it has helped her learn how to intentionally grab onto things. And she can chew on it without gagging, which I love. I attached a pacifier clip so it doesn't fall on the ground. Definitely a favorite toy in our house. High quality. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: alm2013

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was made of plastic and was pleasantly surprised to find it’s made of silicone or rubber or something! Very nice toy great company it a bit bigger than your fist balled up. :) I gave as gift but will be buying for my little one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional but heavy and potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my son started teething really young and many teethed toys were too big for his tiny mouth. The ends of this are small enough for him and easy for him to grasp but it is a bit heavy for him. This is NOT a toy that you should leave with an unsupervised baby as they can push the ends too far in their mouth!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected but my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but my daughter loves it! Its about half the size of the Manhattan Winkel Rattle Toyfor reference
customer_reviews.author: cj428m1

customer_reviews.title: DONT SUBMERGE IN BOILING WATER
customer_reviews.text: Great little rattle. My baby enjoyed grabbing it and putting it in his mouth. But then I put it in boiling water to disinfect bc my sick three year old put it in his mouth and the glossy coating on the rounded balls came off!!! Now they look scratched up and are no longer glossy. I didn’t think it would be so fragile. Makes me a little uneasy to give to my infant now. Otherwise- terrific. Advise others NOT to put in boiling water! Just wash with hot water and soap in the sink as directed by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: CloudRyder9

customer_reviews.title: but it is the perfect size for my 4 month old
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller then I thought it would be, but it is the perfect size for my 4 month old. She has been in love with it from the first day she got it. Super easy to clean and it works wonders for my little teething baby.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Cool baby toy! My kids call it "The coronavirus"
customer_reviews.text: This toy atom is cute and great for a teething baby! It rattles and is a good size for baby to hold and chew on. It's hard plastic but slightly elastic & very well made so it's safe for infants to play with. BTW it's dishwasher safe!! Yay! & Daddy is a chemical engineer so it was a necessary purchase! In all seriousness, it's an awesome toy worth it's price!
customer_reviews.author: Mama knows best!

customer_reviews.title: Great toy/ teether
customer_reviews.text: It is my daughters new favorite toy. I love that it rattles and is easy for her to grip. She shakes it and then it eventually ends up in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT STERILIZE, GAG WARNING & HARD PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: We'll, I wish the manufacturer and seller would read the reviews and update their product description to warn against sterilizing in boiling water. Or at least provide a written warning that this toy will melt, in the product packaging. To agree with other reviewers, I also found the toy does allow for babies to insert the stems very far into their mouths, potentially triggering a gag reflex but seemingly not a danger for choking them. The toy is also very hard plastic and will hurt an infant if thrown by an older sibling. The toy looks cute and is enjoyable by the infant, but too many potential negatives to recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite teething toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! Out of the dozens I've purchased, this is my son's favorite. I honestly didn't expect him to like this one much but it's his favorite. It's easy for him to hold himself, easy to clean, easy to wash and super easy to travel around with. He likes to toss things around especially to the ground thinking it's a game because mama is going to pick it back up, clean it and give it back to him. After a few thousand times I relax you can attach one of those pacifiers clips to one of the ends that don't have a ring in it for the rattle part.
customer_reviews.author: CCJE

customer_reviews.title: If she loves it, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this thing. She was getting frustrated not being able to put things in her mouth very well since she's teething(since 2 months 🤷) She loves to turn it and put all the different spokes in her mouth with ease. It's not only helping her with hand eye coordination, but her teething as well. I turn around for a second and she's got it in her hand or mouth lol.
customer_reviews.author: MetalMommy

customer_reviews.title: It melted
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape of this product are awesome, but it melted. I tried to sanitize it like everything else, a few minutes in boiling water, and it melted. Was I not supposed to put it in a bow and pour hot water over it? That’s what I do for baby bottles and pacifiers (anything he puts in his mouth).
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching baby to hold things
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves this toy! Its very easy to hold, chew on, and fun to look at. Its been her favoret toy since she got the motor skills to hold things. And its very easy to clean I just pop it in some scolding hot water with a drop or 2 of dawn dishsoap and swoosh it around for a few minutes and rinse it off real good and its good to go. Could even be used in the bath if you really wanted. Its great for keeping her entertained in the car or store as well its the perfect size for on the go or just chilling at home in the bouncy seat.
customer_reviews.author: Budget life happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for 10 month old
customer_reviews.text: This colorful teether produces as nice rattling sound when shaken and my 10 month old likes bouncing/throwing it and manipulating the rings. He is far less interested in actually chewing on it (he has two top front and two bottom front teeth) but the plastic is a nice consistency (not too hard or soft) and I can see a younger baby perhaps enjoying it more.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute compact toy that our baby loves!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 month old really loves this toy. It’s easy to pack and take with us when we go out and he is really improving his motor skills with toys like this. He’s also using it for teething and it’s one of his favorite toys at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Mere Mac

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean after a cold
customer_reviews.text: While we absolutely loved this teether, it is impossible to clean! Because of the rings the only way to clean is by inmersion in a boiling pot of water. As every baby product states is the way to sanitize it. We did it once when we received the item and then a cold struck last week and naturally the toys got laundered or sanitized. Putting into each solution is harsh and chemicals so boiling is the safest bet. It was not in the hot water for more than a couple minutes before melting. Sad because my 5mo old really liked the toy!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Regan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, it’s a bit smaller than I imagined which turns out is perfect! It fits well in her hands and is easy and the perfect size for her to teeth on! The material is not hard plastic or grippy silicone it’s something in the middle which I also love bc the grippy silicone that most teething toys are just get filthy and attract all the dog hair ever created. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose: teether/rattle
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy because it is a teething toy and rattle. My 6 month old loves to chew on it, shake it, and bang it on the table. Perfect size for her to chew on but not long enough to gag herself with. Its definitely a favorite in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie P.

customer_reviews.title: Our 5 month old enjoys it!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby boy is just now chewing on things, as his motor skills and hand-eye coordination develop. This toy makes a decent amount of movement in the hands, and plenty of knobs to get his grip on. Only reason I gave it a 4 and not a 5 star is the size of the toy is a bit smaller than I was expecting. But, given he’s a baby, all things should be small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Wish the baby would like it more
customer_reviews.text: I really expected my baby to love this. We got it for her at 8 months and now at 10 months, she has really barely touched it. She puts everything in her mouth to chew so by looking at the design of this, i though she would love it. Not sure what it is, but it's just not really for her i guess. She prefer the Manhattan ball a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe C

customer_reviews.title: 4 month olds favorite teething toy. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So this is been my daughter's favorite teething toy for a few weeks now. It's super easy to hold. fits perfectly in their mouth for teething. She absolutely loves it. It's also been a running joke in our home that it looks like the coronavirus because of its shape lolol we all say "aww you want your coronavirus? Here ya go" hahaha it's a family favorite
customer_reviews.author: Holli Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 5 month old for Christmas and she loves it. It's easy to grab and she likes chewing and pulling on it. She is an early teether, so she likes having something more solid to chew on. It also makes noise when you play with it from the rings rattling around. Baby and parent approved.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Spooner

customer_reviews.title: 4 month old took to this immediately. . .
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our 4 month-old -- she immediately grabbed it and stuck it in her mouth :). When she's in her chair, its very easy for her to drop in her lap and then pick up again. She is very interested when I shake it although she hasn't figured out how to make the rattle herself. Perfect teething/toy for now.
customer_reviews.author: Curvaceous

customer_reviews.title: Returned This - Makes Me Feel Unsafe for Baby
customer_reviews.text: This product is wayyy smaller than I thought. My concern is if one of those balls pops off, baby could choke. Also, when baby was on her tummy putting it in her mouth, the extensions are long enough to reach the back of baby's throat. I am not comfortable with this! I even wrote the manufacturer asking them why they don't just double the product's size and that would fix the problem. I returned this promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing atom!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Baby, loves it! Easy to grip. It rattles and he is mesmerized by it every time he pics it up. Great teething tool as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The nodes are long, baby might gag
customer_reviews.text: I think I enjoy the aesthetic of this toy more than my child. It's really pretty and makes calming rattling sounds. Its smaller than I expected but it's nice cuz I can pack it in my bag and it doesnt take alot of room. I ordered him several toys like this one because he likes toys he can grab easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining, but better suited for older babies
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to hold as I thought it would be. Baby seems to like it but isn’t as interested in it as easier-to-grip toys. She really likes the rattle sounds. I’m a bit wary of the little pieces (if one of the pegs were to break), so this is definitely a toy that she’ll only get to play with while closely supervised.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing sound
customer_reviews.text: Babies LOVE this. My own baby loves her atom and I have given this as a gift to several other babies since discovering it. When you shake it, the little rings make a nice “rain stick” sound. The little atoms are perfect for babies to teeth on. It’s easy for babies to grip, it’s colorful, and small enough for a diaper bag or car seat toy
customer_reviews.author: Mic Mac

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Bought for gifts. I expected it to be larger but the size is clear in the description so it’s all my own fault. The size is probably beneficial to the babies anyway. Just expected it to be more of a swish size. It’s really the size of an adult fist. Brand is reliable. Very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: kms

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy for baby but fun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 week old. It’s very cute and he loves the sound, shape and colors. I’d say the only downfall is it’s a bit too hard for him to hold on to and keep a firm grasp. Maybe a touch heavy for an infant. I’m not sure. Could just be me. But definitely a toy he’s falling in love with. Also the rings on it are great for sensory. He loves touching and grasping and suckling.
customer_reviews.author: Alivea

customer_reviews.title: Hard but flexable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this toy, it does have a rattle sound to it which helps get her attention. its a good size for babies hands. It is not a bigger rattle as it looks in pictures. The little balls that come out are hard, but the stems they are on are flexible. The little rings are cute and my daughter does try to grab them. All in all a good toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jesi

customer_reviews.title: Melted in the steam sterilizer 😭
customer_reviews.text: My baby seriously loved this toy, like lit up when I pulled it out. Every time. It rattles, easy to hold and pick up. It is great for teething. Until you try to clean it being soap and water. I put mine into the countertop steam sterilizer and it melted it. Booooo. Something that goes in babies mouth should be able to be properly cleaned. So sad we had to toss it. So so sad
customer_reviews.author: Kristen is amazing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this teething toy. Her face lights up every time she sees it. She has 8 teeth with 2 more coming. She has enjoyed it since she was about 7 months old(that's when I bought it), and she's 11 months old now. It's still one of her favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: My 4 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old absolutely loves this toy! She can grab it easily and loves popping it in her mouth. Just use regular warm water and soap to wash it... I learned the hard way when I dipped it in some boiling water with her other teether that can be boiled for 5 min for sterilizing. The little knobs started to shrivel/melt. So that was my fault. I wasn't thinking as her other teethers can be boiled. I'd purchase again. She enjoys it! All the pretty colors and rattling sound.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Baby loved this but warped when sanitized
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved this and it was easy for him to hold and chew. But it warped when put in the same sanitizer we use for bottles and all of our other toys. He loved it so much we bought a second one and it also warped. Too bad, but it is cheap in price and you'll get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: 4dogdesigns

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this toy. It is easy to grab, it makes noise, and is colorful. The only downfall is that he is 5 months and putting everything in his mouth. This toy tends to go a little too far back making him gag. We have to watch when he has it. I think it will be fantastic once he’s a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice little toy/teether
customer_reviews.text: The item is just as pictured. My baby likes to hold it, shake it so it rattles, and when she's teething badly she will chew on it. It's stood up well and hasn't shown any teeth marks. The colors in the picture are accurate. I'm glad we purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: RedFawxe

customer_reviews.title: Great teether!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! My twins started teething around 3 months and nothing worked for them since they were really too small to hold something. I bought this around 5 months of age and my daughter loves it. She can easily hold it, it reaches the back teeth and makes a fun jingle noise. She won't drop in around my son for fear he'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Its a little flimsy, I had a friend who's daughter had a Similar toy to this so figured I'd buy one and its definitely not as nice or sturdy as the one she had but still a decent toy great for hand dexterity and sensory development as it also doubles as a rattle. Overall good buy
customer_reviews.author: kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, easy to hold, vibrant color.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is fantastic! Easy to hold onto, easy to chew while holding and very easy to clean. It makes just enough noise, but not too much. If I put this toy down and something else, my little Willow always goes to this toy first!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Marley

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old is getting her front teeth, she loves biting on this toy. Keeps her entertained too if I need to get a quick chore done. Hand washed and air dried. I read in other reviews that it melts in sterilizers haha
customer_reviews.author: ACGThree

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BOIL !!! - DO NOT SANITIZE !
customer_reviews.text: THIS SHOULD HAVE A HUGE STICKER “DO NOT SANITIZE IN BOILING WATER” !! How is this supposed to be safe for kids??!! It literally melted and shriveled the plastic. WHAT A WASTE! Look elsewhere for teething toys.
customer_reviews.author: Rmor444

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Intriguing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to entertain my baby as well as to use for a teether. She loves holding on to the various parts. I was worried that maybe small parts could come off, but have had it now for months with daily use and it is very durable. Fun to use to encourage her to crawl!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: So easy for baby to hold!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old loves this toy. She likes to manipulate it in her hands, passing it over and over again. She chews on the balls some as well but the big fun for her is holding it. It's not silicone but the plastic isn't very hard. The "atoms" bend a bit. I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Q.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This was MUCH smaller than I expected it to be. It easily fits into the palm of my hand, which is ok for the baby but won’t likely be a toy he will play with for a long time as he ages because it is so small.
customer_reviews.author: Derniedog

customer_reviews.title: Great For Teethers
customer_reviews.text: This is great for teething babies! It is a good size making it easy for younger babies to hold, but large enough to give the baby multiple options for teething while holding. My 5 month old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but be aware of choking
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice toy but I do watch my baby when she has this bc of choking. The prong are long enough to gag a small infant so just be aware when baby starts teething and putting it in their mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie thompson

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Though this is a cute toy, don't let the picture fool you. I thought it would have been a bit bigger, but it is tiny. Which is okay, I don't need my little one having a giant toy to play with, but felt like the pictures were misleading. Definitely look at the dimensions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Janae E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My baby first rattle and he loves colors and the noise it makes when he shakes it. He even uses it to teeth and not long enough so he doesn’t choke or swallow on it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose & Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a rattle, teether or simply as a toy for your little one. My daughter loves it, before I purchased it I was nervous that pieces could break off or become a choking hazard but it is very well made and has no signs of deterioration after months of use!
customer_reviews.author: dmoney127

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 month old granddaughter and its one of her favorites! It's easy for her to grab onto, play with, and she likes to chew on all the knobs. I'm happy I picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: christine d.

customer_reviews.title: Third child and this is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is definitely one of my top baby purchases. My baby is only 4 months old but is biting everything and sticking everything in her mouth. This toy, at first, she seemed skeptical. But now she can grab it and put the ends in her mouth with no problem. Another awesome part of it is the rattle portion and how colourful it is. Babies are drawn to colour and mine is no exception. She loves the colours and the fact that when i shake or spin it, it rattles.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! And so far the best I found for teething.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is the perfect size! My daughter loves it! It’s the perfect size for her little hands. Easy to get to those bothersome spots on her gums. She always reaches for this toy. I am so glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great teether toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for teething, grasping and makes light sound when shaken with the small rings on it. Easy to clean. Just have to be careful when baby pushes the toy too far into the mouth because may gag. Overall great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: The balls are too hard
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo didn’t love this as much as I thought she would. She is 7 months old, and I feel like the plastic balls are kinda hard for her to chew on. I don’t feel like it’s a good teething toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought it was.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to like to look at it / hold it, but as teething goes she doesn’t use it or seem to like it for that. The parts are also weird shapes for teething.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jean

customer_reviews.title: Cute and baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy since this was 10 bucks, but it was really worth the price. The ball was smaller than I thought, but my little baby loves the colors and noises and shapes to hold on and chew on the balls
customer_reviews.author: White chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Great teething toy
customer_reviews.text: Babies love this toy so much should have bought two. Easy to hold and put in mouth for a six month old who is teething and color enough to hold their attention
customer_reviews.author: genieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: One of her favourite toy
customer_reviews.text: My lil one absolutely loves playing with it. She's 6 months old and this is the first toy I've seen her truly enjoy. She loves to pick it up and play with it as a rattle. She puts it in her mouth sometimes, but she doesn't really use it as a teether much. She more uses it as a rattle. It brings me joy when I see her grab it as it helps with her developmental skills
customer_reviews.author: Charilie smith

customer_reviews.title: Very popular with the babies
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this for my granddaughter. She loved it so much it is my go-to gift for new babies. They all love to nibble on it, plus it is easy to grab. Can attach a pacifier cord too if you want to keep it off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: One of my sons favorites
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 months. This is one of his favorites. He can grab it easily since the pegs are small and he sucks on the balls and chews for his teeth. It's colorful and rattles if you shake it
customer_reviews.author: Holly C.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this! I wish I could easily hook it onto things but she loves chewing on it. She throws it a lot though so if I could attach it to something it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic teether for my four month old. She absolutely loves it and would highly recommend for anyone with a little one that wants developmentally appropriate toys that support continued exploration and development.
customer_reviews.author: Florabama

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it...BUT
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this... but she tries to put the little things all the way in her mouth and it makes me nervous. They are hard and not soft so... idk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The *almost* perfect baby toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable, attractive to baby, easy to grab! Baby toys need to be able to be sanitized without warping, and this toy began to melt with the water not quite to boiling. It is still usable, but warped.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMom

customer_reviews.title: Portable, Useful, Durable
customer_reviews.text: My five month old loves this toy—it’s her favorite teether. The rings around the pegs are secured, so I’m not worried about them coming off as a choking hazard. The shape is perfect to help her work on dexterity and hand grip.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Robison

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this as a teething toy.
customer_reviews.text: So we just got this in the mail. I couldn’t wait to give it to our small teething human however this thing is SUPER hard and a lot smaller than I thought it would be. He keeps gagging hisself really bad. I wouldn’t recommend this as a teething toy. I would recommend this for a 1 year old maybe if they didn’t put stuff in their mouth. It rattles and they like that noise but this thing is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyne Nohe

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: The toy is easy to hold but my son stuffs it in his mouth and the connector between the side balls and the central ball are not enjoyable for him. He’s only 4 mo old so he can’t control only chewing the side balls; may work better in the future. But he likes the colors and the soft rattle it creates
customer_reviews.author: ioana

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining for hours!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves chewing on it!! Only downside is that I have to make sure I take it away if I'm not watching him closely. Since he rolls over, if one of those teething pieces is in his mouth when he rolls over he could chock. Other than that he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Houk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Infant Toy and Teether
customer_reviews.text: Super easy for my teething 4 month old to pick up and successfully bring to his mouth. He can hold on to the toy far longer than anything else I've given him. It seems to provide him the most teething comfort as well. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My baby seems to enjoy this toy. The colors are vibrant. I like the little rings that slide because they make a rattling noise that is extra fun for her but not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than advertisement would have you believe
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this product is actually only the size of a tennis ball. The product images would have you believe it is a fair bit larger than that.
customer_reviews.author: Tani Kiah

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. Although I bought this for my cockatoo, it would be perfect for a baby. Wonderful quality!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Melts like butter
customer_reviews.text: Like many parents, we sanitize toys before giving them to our child or when they fall on the floor. We sanitized this toy before giving it to our child. It melted into goo. Cheap. None of our child's other toys melt in the sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this toy!! I am so glad I found it on amazon and went with the purchase! Easy for him to grab and it seems to be his favorite teether! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Not a teething toy. More like a rattle.
customer_reviews.text: Meh..cute and makes a rattling sound when you shake it..but not really a great teething toy. I'm not sure exactly what part they should be chewing on...
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for babies hands
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite teething toys to look at for my baby. Reminds me of Willy Wonkas everlasting gobstopper from the original movie. Easy for my baby to grip and pass from hand to hand. Baby loves putting the multiple knobs in his mouth. Perfect size for babies hands.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. I bought a second home for the babysitters house! Great for teething, Easy for baby to hold, and the bright colors keep their attention.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, safe product for babies.
customer_reviews.text: This is colorful, easy for tiny hands to hold, the knobs are just the right size to be helpful for teething babies. It is great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LAWonder10

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 months old with six teeth and has loved this atom and used it since his first tooth at 3 months. Very well manufactured I am not concerned about it coming apart. Also very easy to clean. Baby loves to use this for chewing and shaking it as a rattle, also loves rolling it and chasing it
customer_reviews.author: Falan

customer_reviews.title: A little small but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This toy was perfect for my 6 month old. He loves to chew on the balls. I was a little disappointed in the size but overall I like it and my son seems too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and for my friend's daughter. Favorite toy for both of them. And all my relatives loved photos of my little physicist. :-D
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya L.

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for holding and grabbing. The 'electrons' are soft and somewhat pliable. It rattles a bit and he likes to shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Mgidd

customer_reviews.title: Great teether
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old really likes this toy. It's easy for him to hold and I like that the "arms" aren't long enough for him to jam down his throat and gag himself.
customer_reviews.author: ah

customer_reviews.title: Do not boil to sanitize!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 month old and like to sanitize everything that goes in her mouth by boiling quickly in a pot of water. I’ve never had any issues with any of her other teething toys until now. This toy totally melted in the boil and it was only in there for a few seconds. Over all the toy is great for sensory play, but now the plastic is misshapen and a little sharp on parts so I’m worried about her putting it in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t sanitize properly!!
customer_reviews.text: Was SOOOO excited to give this to my new granddaughter as it would have been perfect for her grabbing stage. My daughter put it in water to sanitize with her bottles and the toy bubbled up and melted!!! What kind of teething baby toy is that?!? Not safe to chew evidently!!!
customer_reviews.author: wayne lear

customer_reviews.title: It is easy for small baby to hold
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the first toys my baby learned to hold, and he played with it for a long time. Plus it works well for teething.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingMom

customer_reviews.title: Modern toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy but when I hand wash it, the water sits in the holes for the screws. I hope it doesn’t rust. My baby drools when he puts it in his mouth. There should be covers for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Dalepartyof2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small babies
customer_reviews.text: Really fun toy for my 4mos old. She’s very small and this is perfect for her hands and mouth unlike a lot of other rattles which are too heavy for her to pick up and explore.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Witter

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It is well made but the ball is smaller than I thought. It would be better if it comes larger. I am afraid the baby will swallow the ball if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Love this teething toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old loves this toy. She can hold it, roll it, toss it, and chew on the round rubbery ends. I want to buy another just to have in my diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Juli Barnes

customer_reviews.title: More like a rattle, not teether
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a rattle, not teether. It's cute and my daughter loves to throw it around but unfortunately not a teether toy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: 11 mos old can't get enough of this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and he loves it. He plays with it and also chews on it. It's a perfect toy/teether. Also, the size is perfect. Big enough to see across the room and small enough to fit into their tiny palms. Too cute!
customer_reviews.author: MangoMylaRei

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Easy to Clean, Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. The only downside is the little nubs are maybe a bit too long, he gags frequently while teething on them. But I mean, they are supposed to learn right? I would rebuy it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Villagran

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVES this toy so much. She will not stop chewing on this thing. I bought it because She was having a hard time with teething toys and she just didn’t like holding them but she loves this toy
customer_reviews.author: Leandra

product_meta.title: Manhattan Toy Atom Rattle & Teether Grasping Activity Baby Toy
product_meta.description: The Atom Rattle & Teether Grasping Activity Baby Toy is a perfect clutching toy for developing gross motor skills. The plastic rings slide back and forth along the flexible dowels when shaken, producing a soft, pleasing rattle, allowing baby to explore cause and effect. Since 1978, Manhattan Toy has been making award-winning, high quality, educational toys for your baby, toddler or kid. From infant toys and baby toys to sensory development toys, our goal is to provide the safest and best toys available. All of our products, from the newest concepts to our time-tested classics, are innovatively designed to inspire imaginative play and are routinely safety tested to pass strict CPSC, ASTM, EN71 and Health Canada safety standards.
feature_bullets: Multi-sensory clutching rattle and teether encourages grasping and reaching which are important for gross motor skills
Perfectly sized for baby hands, rattle rings slide back and forth on the soft, flexible one-piece baby teething stems
Brightly colored infant and baby toy helps stimulate baby's developing vision
Baby teether and rattle passes strict CPSC, ASTM, EN71 and Health Canada safety standards
Baby motor skill toy suitable for infants and toddlers ages 0 months and up; measures 4.5" x 4.5" x 3.5"

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
